tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: The annual IFRS Taxonomy 2019
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: The IFRS Taxonomy 2019 reflects the presentation and disclosure requirements of the IFRS Standards as issued by the International Accounting Standards Board (Board) at 1 January 2019, the IFRS for SMEs Standard as issued by the Board in December 2015 and Practice Statement 1 Management Commentary as issued by the Board in December 2010. The IFRS Taxonomy also includes elements that reflect common reporting practice by entities that apply IFRS Standards (common practice). The IFRS Taxonomy 2019 includes changes to the IFRS Taxonomy 2018 resulting from common reporting practice relating to disclosure requirements in IFRS 13 Fair Value Measurement. In addition, it includes general improvements to the IFRS Taxonomy such as introduction of implementation notes, introduction of duration type elements, removal of entry points without documentation labels and few other improvements.

tp:license.name: The IFRS Taxonomy - Terms and Conditions

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Basic Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the IFRS Taxonomy for full IFRS Standards reporting. Documentation labels are included, but generic links are excluded.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Combined Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the IFRS Taxonomy for full IFRS Standards, IFRS for SMEs Standard and the IFRS Practice Statement Management Commentary reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Deprecated Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the deprecated IFRS Taxonomy elements for IFRS Standards reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Full IFRS Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the IFRS Taxonomy for full IFRS Standards reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Full IFRS and Management Commentary Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the IFRS Taxonomy for full IFRS Standards reporting with the IFRS Practice Statement Management Commentary reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: IFRS for SMEs Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the IFRS Taxonomy for IFRS for SMEs Standard reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Management Commentary Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the IFRS Taxonomy for the IFRS Practice Statement Management Commentary reporting. Documentation labels are included.
